foreignData.name: Wutausbruch des Mogis
foreignData.text: Der Wutausbruch des Mogis fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl so viele Schadenspunkte zu, wie Spontanzauber- und Hexereikarten in deinem Friedhof sind. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.name: Rencor de Mogis
foreignData.text: El Rencor de Mogis hace daño a la criatura objetivo igual a la cantidad de cartas de instantáneo y de conjuro en tu cementerio. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.name: Rancune de Mogis
foreignData.text: La Rancune de Mogis inflige à la créature ciblée un nombre de blessures égal au nombre de cartes d'éphémère et de rituel dans votre cimetière. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.name: Spregio di Mogis
foreignData.text: Lo Spregio di Mogis infligge a una creatura bersaglio danno pari al numero di carte istantaneo e stregoneria nel tuo cimitero. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.name: モーギスの悪意
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。モーギスの悪意はそれに、あなたの墓地にあるインスタント・カードとソーサリー・カードの総数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignData.name: 모기스의 원한
foreignData.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 모기스의 원한은 그 생물에 당신의 무덤에 있는 순간마법과 집중마법 카드 수의 합만큼의 피해를 입힌다. 점술 1. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Rancor de Mogis
foreignData.text: Rancor de Mogis causa à criatura alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao número de cards de mágica instantânea e feitiço no seu cemitério. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.name: Злоба Могия
foreignData.text: Злоба Могия наносит целевому существу повреждения, равные количеству карт мгновенных заклинаний и волшебства на вашем кладбище. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.name: 墨癸斯的怨恨
foreignData.text: 墨癸斯的怨恨对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于你坟墓场中瞬间与法术牌的数量加总。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.name: 墨癸斯的怨恨
foreignData.text: 墨癸斯的怨恨對目標生物造成傷害，其數量等同於你墳墓場中瞬間與巫術牌的數量加總。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

mainBoard.name: Spite of Mogis
mainBoard.originalText: Spite of Mogis deals damage to target creature equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: Spite of Mogis isn't counted among the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. It isn't put there until after it deals damage and you scry 1.

mainBoard.text: Spite of Mogis deals damage to target creature equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Thaumaturges remain silent around chimeras, lest their words conjure even stranger beasts.

foreignData.flavorText: Находясь рядом с химерами, тавматурги хранят молчание, чтобы своими словами не призвать еще более странных чудовищ.

foreignData.name: Jet de magma

foreignData.name: Esplosione di Magma
foreignData.text: L'Esplosione di Magma infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Profetizza 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi mettine un qualsiasi numero in fondo al tuo grimorio e le altre in cima in qualsiasi ordine.)

foreignData.name: マグマの噴流
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。マグマの噴流はそれに２点のダメージを与える。占術２を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見て、そのうちの望む枚数のカードを望む順番であなたのライブラリーの一番下に置き、残りを望む順番で一番上に置く。）

foreignData.name: 용암 점화
foreignData.text: 생물 한 개나 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 용암 점화는 그 목표에 피해 2점을 입힌다. 점술 2. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드들 중 원하는 만큼을 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓고 나머지를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서대로 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.text: Jato de Magma causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou jogador alvo. Vidência 2. (Olhe os dois cards do topo do seu grimório. Depois, coloque qualquer número deles no fundo do seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignData.name: Струя Магмы
foreignData.text: Струя Магмы наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или игроку. Предскажите 2. (Посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки, затем положите любое количество из них в низ вашей библиотеки, а остальные на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.)

mainBoard.name: Magma Jet
mainBoard.originalText: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

mainBoard.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

mainBoard.name: Flamespeaker Adept

rulings.text: Flamespeaker Adept's ability triggers once for each scry instruction, no matter how many cards you're scrying.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

당신이 순간마법이나 집중마법 주문을 발동할 때마다, 점술 1을 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Quimera Presciente
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que conjurar uma mágica instantânea ou feitiço, use vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.name: Химера-Предсказательница
foreignData.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете мгновенное заклинание или заклинание волшебства, предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.name: 预知盖美拉
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当你施放一个瞬间或法术咒语时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.name: 預知蓋美拉
foreignData.text:
飛行
每當你施放一個瞬間或巫術咒語時，占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

mainBoard.name: Prescient Chimera
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.
The triggered ability will resolve and you'll scry before the instant or sorcery spell resolves.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

mainBoard.flavorText:
"It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?"
—Perisophia the philosopher

foreignData.flavorText: „Sie augmentiert die Anamnese. Was ist daran so schwer zu verstehen?" —Perisophia die Philosophin
foreignData.name: Erinnernde Mauer
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
Wenn die Erinnernde Mauer ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexereikarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen.

foreignData.flavorText: "Potencia la anamnesis. ¿Qué tiene eso de confuso?". —Perisofia, la filósofa
foreignData.name: Muro mnemónico
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
Cuando el Muro mnemónico entre al campo de batalla, puedes regresar la carta de instantáneo o de conjuro objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il accentue l'anamnèse. Qu'est-ce que ça a de troublant ? » —Périsophia la philosophe
foreignData.name: Mur mnémonique
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
Quand le Mur mnémonique arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez renvoyer une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignData.flavorText: "Favorisce l'anamnesi. Che cosa c'è di così difficile da capire?" —Perisofia la filosofa
foreignData.name: Muro Mnemonico
foreignData.text:
Difensore
Quando il Muro Mnemonico entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi riprendere in mano una carta istantaneo o stregoneria bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 「これは追憶を増補するの。何も難しいことは言ってないはずよ？」 ――哲人ペリソフィア
foreignData.name: 記憶の壁
foreignData.text:
防衛
記憶の壁が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にあるインスタント・カード１枚かソーサリー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。

foreignData.flavorText: "단순한 기억력 강화 기술이라고. 뭐가 그렇게 이해하기 어렵지?" —철학자 페리소피아
foreignData.name: 학습의 벽
foreignData.text:
수비태세
학습의 벽이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 순간마법이나 집중마법 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ela aumenta a anamnese. O que há de tão confuso nisso?" — Perisofia, a filósofa
foreignData.name: Barreira Mnemônica
foreignData.text:
Defensor
Quando Barreira Mnemônica entra no campo de batalha, você pode devolver o card de mágica instantânea ou feitiço alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignData.flavorText: «Она усиливает воспоминания. Что тут непонятного?» — философ Перисофия
foreignData.name: Мнемоническая Стена
foreignData.text:
Защитник
Когда Мнемоническая Стена выходит на поле битвы, вы можете вернуть целевую карту мгновенного заклинания или волшебства из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignData.flavorText: 「但有此物，记忆久而弥新。这有什么难懂的？」 ～哲人珀里索菲娅
foreignData.name: 记忆墙
foreignData.text:
守军
当记忆墙进战场时，你可以将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignData.flavorText: 「但有此物，記憶久而彌新。這有什麼難懂的？」 ～哲人珀里索菲婭
foreignData.name: 記憶牆
foreignData.text:
守軍
當記憶牆進戰場時，你可以將目標瞬間或巫術牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

mainBoard.name: Mnemonic Wall
mainBoard.originalText:
Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
mainBoard.text:
Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.

foreignData.flavorText: Philosophen sagen, die vermissten Seeleute haben eine bessere Welt betreten. Seeleute sagen, sie sind ertrunken.
foreignData.name: Ende der Reise
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Los filósofos dicen que los desaparecidos en el mar ascendieron a un reino más perfecto. Los marineros dicen que se ahogaron.
foreignData.name: Fin del viaje
foreignData.text: Regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.flavorText: Selon les philosophes, les hommes perdus en mer ont atteint un royaume de perfection. Selon les marins, ils se sont noyés.
foreignData.name: Fin du voyage
foreignData.text: Renvoyez la créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.flavorText: I filosofi dicono che i dispersi in mare siano ascesi a un regno migliore. I marinai dicono che sono annegati.
foreignData.name: Fine del Viaggio
foreignData.text: Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: 哲人たちは、海で失踪した者たちは理想郷へと旅立っていったのだと言った。船乗りたちは、あいつらは溺れたんだと言った。
foreignData.name: 航海の終わり
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignData.flavorText: 철학자들은 바다에서 실종된 선원들이 완벽한 세상으로 갔다고 생각한다. 다른 선원들은 그들이 익사했다고 생각한다.
foreignData.name: 여행의 끝
foreignData.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. 점술 1. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Os filósofos dizem que os desaparecidos no mar ascenderam a um reino de maior perfeição. Os marinheiros dizem que eles se afogaram.
foreignData.name: Fim da Viagem
foreignData.text: Devolva a criatura alvo para a mão de seu dono. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.flavorText: Философы говорят, что пропавшие в море возносятся в более совершенный мир. Моряки говорят, что они утонули.
foreignData.name: Конец Путешествия
foreignData.text: Верните целевое существо в руку его владельца. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.flavorText: 哲人说海上的失踪者升华去了一个更完美的领域。水手说他们淹死了。
foreignData.name: 旅途终点
foreignData.text: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.flavorText: 哲人說海上的失蹤者昇華去了一個更完美的領域。水手說他們淹死了。
foreignData.name: 旅途終點
foreignData.text: 將目標生物移回其擁有者手上。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

mainBoard.name: Voyage's End
mainBoard.originalText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

mainBoard.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

mainBoard.flavorText: An offering to the sea brings an insight from the stars.

foreignData.flavorText: Wer der See ein Opfer darbringt, den belohnen die Sterne mit Erkenntnis.
foreignData.name: Aufstieg der Adler
foreignData.text: Bringe zwei 2/2 blaue Vogel-Verzauberungskreaturenspielsteine mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Una ofrenda al mar proporciona un reflejo de las estrellas.
foreignData.name: Ascenso de águilas
foreignData.text: Pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura encantamiento Ave azules 2/2 con la habilidad de volar. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.flavorText: Une offrande à la mer apporte une vision des étoiles.
foreignData.name: Ascension des aigles
foreignData.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature-enchantement 2/2 bleue Oiseau avec le vol. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.flavorText: Un'offerta consacrata al mare porta una visione dalle stelle.
foreignData.name: Volo delle Aquile
foreignData.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura incantesimo Uccello 2/2 blu con volare. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: 海への捧げものが、星々からの見識をもたらす。
foreignData.name: 鷲の飛翔
foreignData.text: 飛行を持つ青の２/２の鳥・クリーチャー・エンチャント・トークンを２体戦場に出す。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignData.flavorText: 바다에 제물을 바치면 별이 통찰력을 내려 준다.
foreignData.name: 독수리의 비상
foreignData.text: 비행 능력을 가진 2/2 청색 조류 부여마법 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다. 점술 1. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Uma oferenda ao mar traz uma visão das estrelas.
foreignData.name: Ascensão das Águias
foreignData.text: Coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura encantamento azuis 2/2 do tipo Ave com voar. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.flavorText: Сделай подношение морю, и обретешь мудрость звезд.
foreignData.name: Вылет Орлов
foreignData.text: Положите на поле битвы две фишки чар существа 2/2 синяя Птица с Полетом. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.flavorText: 给大海的献礼换回来自群星的洞见。
foreignData.name: 天鹰展翅
foreignData.text: 将两个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生结界生物放进战场。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.flavorText: 給大海的獻禮換回來自群星的洞見。
foreignData.name: 天鷹展翅
foreignData.text: 將兩個2/2藍色，具飛行異能的鳥衍生結界生物放進戰場。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

mainBoard.name: Rise of Eagles
mainBoard.originalText: Put two 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
mainBoard.text: Create two 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature tokens with flying. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

mainBoard.flavorText: The breakthroughs granted by Keranos, god of epiphany, can be surprisingly literal.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn Keranos, Gott der Eingebung, neue Wege offenbart, dann ist das oft sehr wörtlich zu nehmen.
foreignData.name: Blitz des Keranos
foreignData.text: Der Blitz des Keranos fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando Keranos, dios de la epifanía, está de tan mal humor que suelta rayos y relámpagos, resulta más literal de lo previsto.
foreignData.name: Rayo de Keranos
foreignData.text: El Rayo de Keranos hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.flavorText: Les percées accordées par Kéranos, dieu des Épiphanies, peuvent être étonnamment littérales.
foreignData.name: Éclair de Kéranos
foreignData.text: L'Éclair de Kéranos inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le intuizioni concesse da Keranos, dio delle rivelazioni, possono essere letteralmente folgoranti.
foreignData.name: Fulmine di Keranos
foreignData.text: Il Fulmine di Keranos infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: 天啓の神、ケラノスにより賜る現状打破は、時には驚くほど言葉通りな形となって実現することもある。
foreignData.name: ケラノスの稲妻
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。ケラノスの稲妻はそれに３点のダメージを与える。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignData.flavorText: 직관의 신 케레노스의 힘으로 번뜩이는 아이디어를 떠올릴 때는 조심해야 한다. 정말로 번뜩일 수도 있기 때문이다.
foreignData.name: 케레노스의 벼락
foreignData.text: 생물 또는 플레이어 하나를 목표로 정한다. 케레노스의 벼락은 그 목표에 피해 3점을 입힌다. 점술 1. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: As descobertas concedidas por Queranos, deus da epifania, podem ser surpreendentemente literais.
foreignData.name: Raio de Queranos
foreignData.text: Raio de Queranos causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.flavorText: Керан, бог прозрения, помогает исследователям пробить барьеры — иногда в буквальном смысле.
foreignData.name: Разряд Керана
foreignData.text: Разряд Керана наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу или игроку. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.flavorText: 灵思之神刻拉诺斯赐予的思考突破，有可能直白得惊人。
foreignData.name: 刻拉诺斯的电击
foreignData.text: 刻拉诺斯的电击对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.flavorText: 靈思之神刻拉諾斯賜予的思考突破，有可能直白得驚人。
foreignData.name: 刻拉諾斯的電擊
foreignData.text: 刻拉諾斯的電擊對目標生物或玩家造成3點傷害。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

mainBoard.name: Bolt of Keranos
mainBoard.originalText: Bolt of Keranos deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

mainBoard.text: Bolt of Keranos deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
